headers: VSL TUP — VIDEO SALES LETTER AS TRADE

rows.VSL TUP — VIDEO SALES LETTER AS TRADE: The VSL is not 'make a video.' It's a complete business function with its own TUP lifecycle.
A VSL is the highest-leverage single asset in a D2C business.
It determines CAC, conversion rate, AOV, and brand positioning in one artifact.
Getting it wrong costs months of ad spend on a broken funnel.
Getting it right is the difference between $0 and $100K MRR.
Therefore the VSL deserves Trade-level rigor:
Kill criteria (when to scrap and start over)
Iteration cycles (winner found → scale, loser → diagnose → rebuild)

rows.col_3: Research competitors, extract hooks, map objections, study winning VSLs, define offer stack
rows.col_4: 3 unique angles identified, offer stack defined, script outline approved
rows.col_5: Cannot identify a single differentiated angle after 5 days

rows.col_3: Write 3 script variants (different hooks/angles), internal review, read-aloud test
rows.col_4: 3 scripts complete, founder approves top 2, read-aloud passes flow test
rows.col_5: Scripts feel generic after 3 rewrites — thesis may be wrong

rows.col_3: Record 2 variants (UGC-style + authority-style), edit, add B-roll/graphics/captions
rows.col_4: 2 finished videos, <4 min each, all CTAs clear, landing page matched
rows.col_5: Production quality below minimum bar after 2 attempts

rows.col_3: Launch both variants, $50-100/day each, track hook rate/hold rate/CVR/CPA
rows.col_4: One variant shows >25% hook rate and CPA within 2x target
rows.col_5: Both variants below 15% hook rate after $500 spend — back to scripting

rows.col_3: Test new hooks on winner, test offers, test audiences, scale spend on winners
rows.col_4: CPA at or below target at $200/day spend, 3+ winning hook variants
rows.col_5: CPA not improving after 3 rounds of hooks — fundamental VSL rebuild

rows.col_3: Increase spend, launch on new platforms, create derivative content from winner
rows.col_4: Profitable at $500+/day, VSL is primary revenue driver
rows.col_5: CPA degrades >30% at scale — creative fatigue, need new VSL TUP
